import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";var dark=colors.dark,white=colors.white,info=colors.info;var borderWidth=borders.borderWidth,borderColor=borders.borderColor;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{color:info.main,transition:"all 200ms linear","&.Mui-active":{color:white.main},"&.Mui-completed":{color:white.main}},alternativeLabel:{top:"14%",left:"-50%",right:"50%"},line:{borderWidth:"".concat(borderWidth[3]," !important"),borderColor:"currentColor"}}};
